sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' function Certificate({result}) { const location = useLocation() const data = location.state return (

name: {data.name.toUpperCase()}

seat number: {data.seatno}

branch: {data.exam.branch}

sem: {data.exam.sem}

year: {data.exam.year}

Marks

    {Object.keys(data.marks).map((item, index) => { return
  • {item} : {Object.values(data.marks)[index]}
    • })}

SGPI: {data.sgpi}

remark: {data.remark}

) } export default Certificate
